about-values.title: Our Values
about-values.subtitle: Our core principles guide everything we do—transparency, measurable impact, and client-first approach.
about-values.drivesDescription: At TwelfthKey, our values aren't just words on a wall—they're the foundation of how we work with every client, on every engagement.

value1.title: Measurable Impact
value1.description: We believe in quantifiable results. Every engagement is designed to deliver measurable improvements in governance maturity, cost savings, and operational efficiency.

value2.title: Transparency
value2.description: Clear communication, honest assessments, and transparent processes. No hidden agendas, no surprises—just straightforward guidance.

value3.title: Client-First Approach
value3.description: Your success is our success. We tailor every solution to your specific needs, industry, and business stage.

value4.title: Continuous Learning
value4.description: We stay at the forefront of operational excellence through research, case studies, and continuous improvement of our methodologies.

about-values.commitmentDescription: This proprietary principle guides our approach. We help you measure what matters, manage it effectively, and govern it sustainably. Every engagement is designed to create lasting, measurable change.
about-values.experienceDescription: Book a discovery call to see how our values translate into results for your business.

case-studies-banking.title: Banking Operations Transformation
case-studies-banking.subtitle: 68% Error Reduction, Audit Findings → Near Zero
case-studies-banking.challengeTitle: Process Chaos Impacting Customer Satisfaction & Compliance
case-studies-banking.challenge1: High transaction error rate (15–20% of all transactions)
case-studies-banking.challenge2: Slow processing times (24–48 hours for standard transfers)
case-studies-banking.approachDescription: Applied CYCLE framework over 90 days with focus on predictive operational consistency.
case-studies-banking.approach1: Process mapping (value-stream analysis of transaction workflows)
case-studies-banking.approach4: Dashboard design (real-time error tracking, SLA monitoring)
case-studies-banking.testimonial: TwelfthKey didn't just give us SOPs—they transformed our culture from firefighting to discipline. Our audit findings went to zero, and our team feels empowered for the first time.
case-studies-banking.readyTitle: Apply This Approach to Your Business
case-studies-banking.readyDescription: Start with a free Operational Health Diagnostic

pe-serviced-apartments-goa-ops.title: Guest experience was strong-but operations were leaking money.
pe-serviced-apartments-goa-ops.outcome: SOPs + daily closing discipline + complaint SLAs created predictable delivery.

pe-morjim-restaurant-footfall.title: Footfall dropped after launch-and marketing was 'half-hearted'.
pe-morjim-restaurant-footfall.outcome: Marketing execution got governed like operations: KPIs, attribution, cadence, accountability.

pe-boutique-resort-meta-governance.title: Agency spend was happening, but bookings weren't predictable.
pe-boutique-resort-meta-governance.outcome: Weekly performance governance + data readiness + clear KPIs turned marketing into an operating system.

pe-real-estate-data-hygiene.title: The project may be real-but the data was not investor-ready.
pe-real-estate-data-hygiene.outcome: Standardized project data pack + tracking discipline so decisions stop depending on guesswork.

fe-commercial-project-40cr.title: Asset exists, location is strong-but fundraise needed 'DPR-grade' clarity.
fe-commercial-project-40cr.outcome: Rebuilt fundraise as milestone-based tranches + risk controls + sharper revenue logic.

fe-insurance-broker-20cr.title: Strong scale-but the wrong capital story for the wrong mandate.
fe-insurance-broker-20cr.outcome: Repositioned the raise: ticket sizing, structure, milestones, and investor-fit.

fe-travel-tech-seed-model.title: Deck existed, but problem statement + burn math didn't.
fe-travel-tech-seed-model.outcome: Tightened model sequencing (revenue-first), realistic burn, and milestone-linked ask.

fe-logistics-app-idea-stage.title: Idea was promising-but not fundable yet.
fe-logistics-app-idea-stage.outcome: Built a 'make-it-fundable' plan: MVP, revenue proof, partners, and a clean ask.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear answers to common questions about our process, tools, services, and platform.

items.question: How do I know this will work for my business?
items.answer: Every engagement starts with diagnostics using our G2P framework and cost leakage tools. You'll see the specific gaps and opportunities before committing to anything beyond the assessment.

items.question: Can you help pinpoint my exact challenges before we start?
items.answer: Yes! Book a discovery call. We'll ask targeted questions and give you initial insights. No paywall to clarity.

items.question: How quickly can I see measurable results?
items.answer: Early wins appear within 30–60 days of implementation. Full transformation typically shows up in the first 90 days.

items.question: Will my team be able to sustain these improvements after engagement?
items.answer: Absolutely. We embed governance loops and train your team to operate independently. The goal is a self-correcting system that improves without us.

items.question: What's your success rate?
items.answer: 12+ case studies show 35–59% governance improvements and ₹45–90L annual cost savings. Your specific outcome depends on your starting point and commitment to implementation.

items.question: Is my data secure when I use your calculators?
items.answer: Yes, encrypted and never shared. Data is deleted after 90 days unless you request follow-up.

items.question: Do you contact me after I use a tool?
items.answer: Only if you request a callback or book a discovery call. No unsolicited sales.

items.question: Can I use tools multiple times?
items.answer: Absolutely—track progress over time.

items.question: How accurate are the calculator results?
items.answer: Built on TwelfthKey's industry benchmarks and G2P framework. Your report includes context and next-step recommendations.

items.question: Are the tools really free?
items.answer: Yes. All 8 diagnostics and calculators are free to use. We offer a detailed PDF report and optional discovery call to discuss results.

items.question: What's the difference between Assessment and Foundation?
items.answer: Assessment is a 5–7 day deep-dive that delivers a prioritised roadmap and ROI projection. Foundation is the 60-day implementation that builds SOPs, workflows, and dashboards based on that roadmap.

items.question: Do you work with startups only, or also established MSMEs?
items.answer: Both. We work with companies in the 5–100 Cr revenue range, typically with 3+ years of operating history—from scaling startups to established MSMEs.

items.question: What industries do you serve?
items.answer: Banking, FinTech, SaaS, IT Services, Telecom, Healthcare, E-commerce, and Professional Services. Our G2P framework adapts to service-based operations across sectors.

items.question: Is the engagement remote or on-site?
items.answer: Discovery and most design work are virtual. Implementation can include on-site workshops and training where needed; we tailor to your preference.

items.question: What if we're not ready for a full engagement?
items.answer: Start with a discovery call or a Business Operational Assessment. There's no obligation beyond the assessment—you decide the next step with full clarity.

items.question: What is PraXio™?
items.answer: PraXio™ is TwelfthKey's governance and operations platform: real-time dashboards, automated reporting, and AI anomaly detection—all in one app for our clients.

items.question: Do I need PraXio™ to work with TwelfthKey?
items.answer: It depends on the engagement. Assessment and some Foundation work can be done without it; Governance Intelligence and ongoing fractional CBO typically use PraXio™ for dashboards and reporting.

items.question: Can PraXio™ connect to our existing tools?
items.answer: Yes. PraXio™ integrates with HRMS, CRM, ERP, and common productivity tools. We'll map your stack during onboarding.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes. We offer a 14-day free trial with full access. Request a demo or start a trial from the PraXio™ demo page.

items.question: Why don't you publish timeline and budget on the website?
items.answer: Every engagement is scoped after a diagnostic. We provide a clear proposal with deliverables and investment after understanding your context—no one-size-fits-all pricing.

items.question: What does the Assessment cost?
items.answer: The Business Operational Assessment is ₹1,49,999 (one-time, 5–7 days). Typical ROI identified is ₹40–60L in recoverable leakage.

items.question: Do you offer payment plans?
items.answer: For larger engagements we can discuss phased payment aligned to milestones. Details are in the proposal.

items.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
items.answer: For one-time services, we offer a 100% refund within 30 days if the engagement has not been initiated. See our Refund Policy for full terms.

items.question: How is Fractional CBO different from a consultant?
items.answer: A fractional CBO is an on-demand executive: hands-on execution, mentorship, and strategic oversight—not just advice. You get 8–12 hours/week of leadership without full-time cost.

items.question: What's the typical commitment for Fractional CBO?
items.answer: Minimum 6-month retainer. Investment is ₹1,99,999/month for 8–12 hours/week, scalable for execution phases.

items.question: How much do we save vs. a full-time CXO?
items.answer: Typically 65–80% cost savings compared to a full-time hire, with no long-term commitment and immediate access to senior expertise.

items.question: Can we scale hours up or down?
items.answer: Yes. Hours can be scaled based on business needs—e.g. more during implementation, less during steady state.

items.question: How do you handle our data?
items.answer: We follow GDPR-aligned practices, encrypt data in transit and at rest, and describe collection and use in our Privacy Policy. We can sign Data Processing Agreements where required.

items.question: Are you PCI-DSS compliant?
items.answer: We are PCI-DSS ready for payment processing. For card data we use compliant gateways; we do not store card details on our systems.

items.question: Do you support audit and compliance evidence?
items.answer: Yes. PraXio™ and our processes support audit trails and evidence collection for governance and compliance reviews.

items.question: What's the first step?
items.answer: Book a 45-minute discovery call. We'll discuss your context, pain points, and fit—no obligation. You can also run a free Operational Health Diagnostic first.

items.question: No credit card required?
items.answer: Correct. Discovery calls and free tools require no credit card. You only enter payment when you sign an engagement.

items.question: Will I get sales pressure?
items.answer: No. Our goal is clarity. We'll recommend next steps only when they fit your situation—no high-pressure tactics.

items.question: Can I talk to someone before booking?
items.answer: Yes. Use the contact form, live chat (when available), or email. We respond within 1–2 business days.

faq.contactPrompt: Book a discovery call or reach out—we're happy to help.

framework-arc.title: ARC – Resilience and Continuity
framework-arc.subtitle: Resilience and continuity (crisis-proofing)—build systems that auto-resolve issues
framework-arc.keyFocus: Key Focus: Mean Time to Auto-Resolution (MTTAR)
framework-arc.keyFocusDescription: ARC reduces MTTAR by automating issue detection, escalation, and resolution workflows, building resilient systems that self-correct.
framework-arc.readyDescription: Crisis-proof your operations with automated resilience

framework-cycle.title: CYCLE – Predictive Operational Consistency
framework-cycle.subtitle: Stabilize, optimize, and automate for reliable performance

yield.desc: Forecast risk, model demand, set thresholds

framework-cycle.resultText: 68% error reduction, audit findings → 0, customer satisfaction +30%
framework-cycle.readyDescription: Start with a free Operational Health Diagnostic

framework-g2p.title: The G2P Framework™
framework-g2p.subtitle: PhD-backed, research-driven methodology for service companies delivering measurable operational maturity
framework-g2p.whatIsDescription: G2P bridges strategy and execution by making governance measurable. Unlike manufacturing-focused methodologies (Lean, Six Sigma), G2P is built for service businesses where knowledge work, decision-making, and autonomy drive performance.
framework-g2p.tenet2: Autonomy must be earned, not granted
framework-g2p.tenet3: Decisions improve when cognitive load is managed
framework-g2p.tenet5: Resilience comes from automation + human oversight

stage1.title: Diagnose
stage1.desc: Assess current maturity across all 5 indices

stage4.title: Measure
stage4.desc: Track indices on PraXio™ dashboards monthly

framework-g2p.readyDescription: Start with a free Operational Health Diagnostic to see your G2P indices

framework-morph.title: MORPH – Institutionalized Innovation
framework-morph.subtitle: Institutionalized innovation and reinvention—accelerate idea-to-execution
framework-morph.keyFocusDescription: MORPH accelerates learning velocity by institutionalizing innovation processes, rapid prototyping, and continuous feedback loops.

framework-parse.title: PARSE – Strategic Reset and Realignment
framework-parse.subtitle: Navigate crisis recovery and organizational restructuring with precision
framework-parse.keyMetricDescription: Measures strategic alignment and governance effectiveness during transformation

framework-prism.title: PRISM – Experience-Driven Governance
framework-prism.subtitle: Experience-driven governance (CXEX)—optimize customer experience and retention
framework-prism.keyFocusDescription: PRISM optimizes customer experience by mapping customer journeys, identifying pain points, and implementing governance loops that ensure consistent, high-quality experiences.

framework-sage.title: SAGE – Cognitive Governance
framework-sage.subtitle: Cognitive governance for mature ecosystems—reduce decision-maker burden
framework-sage.useCase4: Need for decision clarity and speed
framework-sage.keyFocusDescription: SAGE reduces cognitive load by simplifying decision frameworks, automating routine decisions, and empowering teams with clear authorities.
framework-sage.outcome4: Leadership bandwidth freed for strategic work
framework-sage.readyDescription: Simplify decision-making and empower your teams

legal-accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
legal-accessibility.commitmentText: TwelfthKey Consulting is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.
legal-accessibility.wcagDescription: We aim to meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards, including:
legal-accessibility.wcag1: Color contrast ratios of at least 4.5:1
legal-accessibility.feedbackText: If you encounter accessibility barriers, please contact us at:

pciDss.title: PCI-DSS Compliance
pciDss.description: We maintain PCI-DSS compliance for payment processing. All payment data is encrypted and handled according to PCI-DSS standards.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.description: We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for EU clients. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data.

iso27001.title: ISO 27001 Path
iso27001.description: We are on the path to ISO 27001 certification for information security management. Our security practices align with ISO 27001 standards.

dpa.title: Data Processing Agreements
dpa.description: Data Processing Agreements (DPAs) are available on request for enterprise clients. Contact us at

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.description: We maintain comprehensive audit logs for compliance evidence collection. All access, modifications, and data processing activities are logged.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide a better experience and analyze site usage.

essential.desc: Required for the website to function properly

analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors use our site (Google Analytics)

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.description: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

section1.title: 1. Informal Resolution
section1.description: We encourage parties to resolve disputes informally through direct communication. Please contact us at

section2.title: 2. Arbitration
section2.description: Any disputes that cannot be resolved informally shall be resolved through binding arbitration in Mumbai, India, in accordance with the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 2015.

section3.title: 3. Governing Law
section3.description: This agreement is governed by the laws of India, and any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts in Mumbai, Maharashtra.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.description: This Data Processing Agreement (DPA) governs the processing of personal data by TwelfthKey Consulting on behalf of our clients in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

section2.title: 2. Data Processing
section2.description: We process personal data only as instructed by the client and in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR and the Information Technology Act, 2000 (India).

section3.title: 3. Security Measures
section3.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of personal data, including encryption, access controls, and regular security assessments.

section1.title: One-Time Services
section1.description: 100% refund within 30 days if engagement has not been initiated. No refunds after commitment begins, except in cases of natural calamity or medical emergency (evaluated case-by-case).

section2.title: Ongoing Services
section2.description: For monthly retainer services (e.g., Fractional CBO), cancellation requires 30 days written notice. No refunds for services already rendered.

section3.title: PraXio™ Platform
section3.description: PraXio™ subscriptions can be cancelled at any time. No refunds for the current billing period, but service will not renew.

section1.title: 1. Service Description
section1.description: TwelfthKey Consulting provides operational excellence consulting services, including assessments, process improvement, governance implementation, and fractional CBO services.

section2.title: 2. Engagement Terms

section3.title: 3. Limitations of Liability
section3.description: TwelfthKey Consulting's liability is limited to the fees paid for the specific engagement. We are not liable for indirect, consequential, or incidental damages.

section4.title: 4. Dispute Resolution

process.title: How Our Governance-to-Performance Process Works
process.subtitle: A structured path from diagnostic to dashboards, built for startups and MSMEs that need discipline without corporate bureaucracy.

step1.title: Discovery Pre-Engagement Call
step1.description: Revenue, operating model, key pain points, current governance maturity

step2.title: Diagnostic – Business Operational Assessment
step2.description: Deep-dive interviews, process value-stream mapping, risk modeling, governance gap analysis

step3.title: Design – G2P Intervention Blueprint
step3.description: Select primary methodology, scope phase 1 deliverables, design governance loops

step4.title: Execution – Process Excellence Implementation
step4.description: Build SOPs, train teams, pilot routines, stabilize new value streams

step5.title: Govern & Evolve – Ongoing Fractional CBO Leadership
step5.description: Quarterly governance reviews, continuous improvement, real-time dashboard monitoring

process.readyDescription: Every great business started with a single decision to improve.

faq1.question: Is my data secure?
faq1.answer: Yes, encrypted and never shared. Deleted after 90 days unless you request follow-up.

faq2.question: Do you contact me after I use a tool?
faq2.answer: Only if you request a callback or book a discovery call. No unsolicited sales.

faq3.question: Can I use tools multiple times?

faq4.question: How accurate are the results?
faq4.answer: Built on TwelfthKey's industry benchmarks and SaaS platform. Your report includes context and next-step recommendations.
